synopsis
In May 1984 the director Claudio Cunha premiered the film Oh! REBUCETEIO with actresses like tip then pornochanchada Eleni Bandettini (Leticia), the work became a milestone in erotic cinema in Brazil, with its scenes of explicit sex, women a little more hairy, no silicones, and without the use of condoms, taken spontaneous scenes, all very natural and full of realism, was born there the successor to the new cinema and Brazilian pornochanchada. OH! REBUCETEIO was a precursor of sex on screen in Brazil, traveled the world with the realism of your scenes, thus earning a place of honor in the history of erotic cinema in Brazil.
